Plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?
Title: The Player
Actors: Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Fred Ward, Whoopi Goldberg
tomatoConsensus: Bitingly cynical without succumbing to bitterness, The Player is one of the all-time great Hollywood satires -- and an ensemble-driven highlight of the Altman oeuvre.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 22 nominations.
